response.overview: Countless people have participated and sacrificed their life in the Freedom Movement of our country to get the Independence, what we are enjoying today. Under the leadership of Mahatma Gandhiji millions of people took part and contributed in their own way for the freedom struggle through ‘Non Violence’.Tania, a Dalith, whose job is to clean the toilets of the town, also contributes in his own way for the freedom struggle. What made the innocent Tania to support the freedom movement, how he contributed and how he changed the mind of a cruel British Police Officer is the essence of the “BHUGIILU”.
response.title: Bhugiilu
